Title: Do the Wrong Thing
Plot: Debra gets to know a local crime writer who's dug up some incriminating dirt on Hannah McKay. Quinn gets an offer he tries to refuse and Batista is drawn to a new business opportunity. LaGuerta keeps digging into the Bay Harbor Butcher case.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sexual themes
GuestStars: Yvonne Strahovski, Ray Stevenson, Santiago Cabrera
